data.event: Clifton is a former village and historic manor, now situated within the suburbs of the city of Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England.

event.title: was recorded in the Domesday Book of 1086

data.event: The manor of Clifton was recorded in the Domesday Book of 1086 as having a church and a mill.

event.title: had decreased since the Norman Conquest of 1066

data.event: The value of the manor had decreased since the Norman Conquest of 1066 from £16 to £9.

event.title: 700 years the Clifton family of Clifton owned

data.event: For 700 years the Clifton family of Clifton owned the manor, of which their manor house was Clifton Hall.
